page.title: 03HOLSWORTHY CATTLE MARKET
page.content: The Holsworthy Cattle Market first started in 1905.It is held every Wednesday and Thursday throughout the year.On Wednesdays the main market day a variety of livestock including beef cattle,sheep,pigs,calves,bulls & poultry are sold by the auctioneers Kivell & Sons.On Thursdays only dairy cattle are sold.Approximately 8000 fat cattle,7500 barren cows,75000 fat sheep,5000 fat pigs,23000 calves, 7400 store cattle,1800 dairy cattle, 45000 store sheep,1000 store pigs & 65 bulls are sold each year. The Cattle market is very popular with the local farmers and provides a meeting point for agricultural discussion.It could be said that Holsworthy town would not be the focal point of the area without the weekly market.The market is one of the biggest and most important of the area
